data.name: WP9 2022 米国・欧州牧場 最速開設セット
data.detailed_description: This set allows you to open an overseas player farm in the U.S. and Europe as soon as possible after the game starts (the first week of February after the second year).
data.about_the_game: This set allows you to open an overseas player farm in the U.S. and Europe as soon as possible after the game starts (the first week of February after the second year).
data.short_description: This set allows you to open an overseas player farm in the U.S. and Europe as soon as possible after the game starts (the first week of February after the second year).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 11 Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 各日本語64bit版
  • Processor: ■Windows8.1/10：Intel Core i3-4170 以上　■Windows11：Intel Core i3-8350K 以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ■Windows8.1/10：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti (1GB)以上、AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB)以上、1280×720　■Windows11：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)以上、AMD Radeon R7 360 (2GB)以上、1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
  • Additional Notes: ※1280 x 720ピクセル以上表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、メモリのシステム要件は4GB RAM、DirectX バージョンは12です。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 11 Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 各日本語64bit版
  • Processor: ■Windows8.1/10：Intel Core i3-4170 以上　■Windows11：Intel Core i3-8350K 以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ■Windows8.1/10：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti (1GB)以上、AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB)以上、1280×720　■Windows11：NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB)以上、AMD Radeon R7 360 (2GB)以上、1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bitステレオ48kHzWAVE形式が再生可能なもの
  • Additional Notes: ※1280 x 720ピクセル以上表示可能なディスプレイ　※Windows® 11をご使用の場合、メモリのシステム要件は4GB RAM、DirectX バージョンは12です。
